generalfeedback.text:
{@thm@}

{@proof_display(ta1, proof_steps)@}

Just to note that in this proof the following step is not needed at all.

"Using commutativity of matrix multiplication we get:"

Indeed, in writing \[ B^3 = \left(P^{-1}AP\right)^3 \] \[ = \left(P^{-1}AP\right)\left(P^{-1}AP\right)\left(P^{-1}AP\right)\] we now use associativity (not commutativity) to get \[ = P^{-1}A\left(PP^{-1}\right)A\left(PP^{-1}\right)AP\] \[ = P^{-1}AIAIAP\] \[ = P^{-1}A^3P\]
